title: Absinthe Frappe Recipe
full_text:
Absinthe Frappe Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
absinthe
1
teaspoon
sugar
1
dash
anisette
(optional)
Chilled soda water
Directions
Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker and stir until sugar is dissolved (or you can make life easier by just using simple syrup). Fill shaker with ice and shake well for 10 seconds; strain into a chilled highball glass and top with two ounces of chilled soda water (or more, to taste).
For a longer, colder drink, fill the chilled highball glass with crushed ice, and strain the drink over ice before adding the soda water. You may wish to add less soda to this version, as the ice will provide additional dilution.
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
